details.title: Errata
details.abstract: Two editorial errors occurred in the IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine, Volume 30, Number 9 on page 12, in the article, ???Integrated Modular Avionics Past, Present, and Future,??? by Thomas Gaska, Chris Watkins, and Yu Chen. First, the second author???s name was incorrectly spelled as Chris Watkin, while it should have been Chris Watkins. Second, the affiliations for the two of the authors were incorrect.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
